alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 6:30PM CDT until July 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL SHELBY AND SOUTH CENTRAL JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 630 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Inverness to near North Bibb, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hoover, Vestavia Hills, Alabaster, Bessemer, Homewood, Pelham, Helena, Chelsea, Indian Springs Village, Oak Mountain State Park, Maylene, Bluff Park, Oak Mountain Amphitheater, Inverness, Riverchase, Patton Creek, Hoover Metropolitan Stadium, Ross Bridge, Riverchase Galleria and Meadowbrook. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
